messages.messageBody:
I will forward your post to my daughter, Lanora, she has attended the last
two summers.

Kris

> Lynn in Florida

messages.subject: Live and Learn Conference info
messages.msgSnippet: ... I m unable to memorize the URL for that conference, but this one was easy for me to memorize: http://sandradodd.com/abq And it links to the real site, plus
messages.messageBody:
On Feb 20, 2006, at 3:46 PM, Lynn wrote:

> Also, tell me more about the Live and Learn conference too!
> My state's homeschool curriculum fair convention just doesn't do it
> for me.
> Thanks!



I'm unable to memorize the URL for that conference, but this one was
easy for me to memorize:
http://sandradodd.com/abq

And it links to the real site, plus has info on the physical site and
surroundings of this year's, and links to MANY many photos of last
year's.

Sandra

messages.subject: NBTSCamp
messages.msgSnippet: Hi, We d love to hear more about NBTS camp from kids who have attended it! My daughter will be 12 in May. She IS interested in NBTS camp. Maybe not for this
messages.messageBody:
Hi,
We'd love to hear more about NBTS camp from kids who have attended it!
My daughter will be 12 in May.
She IS interested in NBTS camp. Maybe not for this Summer, but 2007.
I am also interested in working at it!
Also, tell me more about the Live and Learn conference too!
My state's homeschool curriculum fair convention just doesn't do it for me.
Thanks!
Lynn in Florida

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
